ud8.7:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava kosalesu addhanamaggappatipanno hoti ayasmata nagasamalena pacchasamanena.
ud8.7:1.3: Addasa kho ayasma nagasamalo antaramagge dvidhapatham.
ud8.7:1.7: Evam vutte, bhagava ayasmantam nagasamalam etadavoca:
ud8.7:2.2: tatiyampi kho ayasma nagasamalo bhagavantam etadavoca:
ud8.7:2.5: Tatiyampi kho bhagava ayasmantam nagasamalam etadavoca:
ud8.7:2.8: Atha kho ayasma nagasamalo bhagavato pattacivaram tattheva chamayam nikkhipitva pakkami:
ud8.7:3.1: Atha kho ayasmato nagasamalassa tena panthena gacchantassa antaramagge cora nikkhamitva hatthehi ca padehi ca akotesum pattanca bhindimsu sanghatinca vipphalesum.
ud8.7:3.2: Atha kho ayasma nagasamalo bhinnena pattena vipphalitaya sanghatiya yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi.
ud8.7:3.3: Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma nagasamalo bhagavantam etadavoca:
ud8.7:3.4: “idha mayham, bhante, tena panthena gacchantassa antaramagge cora nikkhamitva hatthehi ca padehi ca akotesum, pattanca bhindimsu, sanghatinca vipphalesun”ti.
ud8.7:4.1: Atha kho bhagava etamattham viditva tayam velayam imam udanam udanesi:
